input_text:
Job Title: J3 Current Operations Integrator/Senior Contract Manager 

Location: Homestead, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Quality Assurance, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Celestar Corporation is seeking a J3 Current Operations Integrator/Senior Contract Manager supporting the Special Operations Command South (SOCSOUTH) Directorate of Operations Program Support (DOPS) primarily located at Homestead ARB, Florida. If interested and qualified, we welcome you to apply for this challenging opportunity.
ANTICIPATED AWARD DATE: May 31, 2024ANTICIPATED START MONTH: June 15, 2024PERIOD OF PERFORMANCE: 1 Base Year + 2 Option YearsLOCATION: Homestead ARB, FloridaCLEARANCE REQUIREMENT: Active TS/SCI Security Clearance About Us:Celestar, a Veteran Owned Company is Very Competitive with Salaries and Benefits. As an example, we offer Company Paid Benefits that include Employee and Family Dental Insurance, Employee Health Insurance, Life Insurance and Disability Insurance as well. We also offer a 401K retirement company match, paid Holidays and Personal Time off.
Responsibilities:Manage all FTEs and be responsible for the overall execution of the contract including technical and quality control oversight and has a detailed knowledge of the daily activities associated with the contract. Track current and future operations and make recommendations both internal and external to SOCSOUTH. Maintain a SME level of operational tempo and is the conduit for all items coming to/from SOCSOUTH HQ, as well as the primary monitoring center for all operational activities within the USSOUTHCOM AOR. Maintain a high level of situational awareness for all activities occurring within the SOCSOUTH sphere of influence acting as the JOD floor manager. Supervise and lead the Battlewatch Support Team, providing oversight and management of all Battlewatch Specialists. Maintain awareness of JOD/J3 activities and provide leadership, mentorship, training, and knowledge management requirements to all subordinate Battlewatch specialists. Recommend all procedural and/or contractual changes necessary to gain/optimize internal efficiencies. Monitor daily activities of all contact personnel; ensures satisfactory completion of all assigned work across the contract. Resolve issues that may arise in the completion of all assigned work across entire contract, tasks and objectives, and reporting requirements in a timely manner. Oversee and perform quality checks of deliverables produced by all contract personnel. Work in the J3 Current Operations Division (or as required by the J3 Director) and coordinate workflow across all J3 Divisions, particularly taskings that require workflow across multiple divisions and directorates within SOCSOUTH HQs. Maintain SME-level knowledge of operational-level details associated with operations, actions, and investments of USSOF within the USSOUTHCOM AOR. Maintain SME-level knowledge of all mission related activities within the JOD and J3. Maintain a high level of situational awareness of internal and external Command requirements and suspense. Proactively search for organizational problems and advises J3 Director and Division Chiefs regarding projects, tasks, and operations problem-solving. Advise the J3 Director and Division Chiefs on designs/changes to J3 processes to maximize staffing efficiencies. Maintain daily JOD/operations schedule for all activities occurring within the SOCSOUTH J3. Ensures adherence to master plans and schedules, develops solutions to achieve long-term Command objectives. Compile/build weekly and monthly reporting requirements (e.g., SITREPS, Activity Reports, yearly reports etc.) Compile/build Command Update briefings, as required. Maintain daily communications with counterparts at USSOCOM, USSOUTHCOM, JFLCC, JFACC, JFMCC, JTF-B, JIATF-S, and JTF-4. Relays information from counterparts to appropriate J3 staff for situational awareness/execution
Required Skills/Qualifications: years SOF military experience with 3 years of experience working within or for a HQs focused within the USSOUTHCOM AORa minimum of 2 years in an operational or strategic level headquarters (O-6 HQs or above) with demonstrated experience of managing reporting requirements, coordinating daily operational meetings with higher headquarters.in supervisory positions for minimum of 3 years, demonstrating an experience to serve as a senior contract manager for up to 23 FTE contract employeespossess and maintain a current TS/SCI clearance.
Come onboard with a company that Values its Employees!Celestar is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, protected veteran status, disability status, gender identity or national origin.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: J3 Current Operations Integrator/Senior Contract Manager
